---
title: Example AR(2) Model
----

From the Stan-Users Mailing List.


```{r}
stan_includes_dir <- "stan/includes"
training_data <- dget("examples/ar2/training_data_list.txt")

model_code <- stanc_builder("examples/ar2/linear_trend_ar2.stan", isystem = stan_includes_dir)
fit.stan2 <- stan(model_code = model_code$model_code,
                  data = list(n = length(training_data),
                              y = matrix(training_data),
                              a1 = rep(0, 4),
                              P1 = diagonal(1e6, 4)),
                   chains = 4,
                   iter = 2000,
                   warmup = 1000, thin = 1)
```
